ing: 1/2 cup QuakerÂ® Oats (Quick or Old Fashioned, uncooked)
des: "Overnight oats make breakfast a breeze--and with blueberries, banana, honey, vanilla, and pecans, this one's a delicious treat!"
ins:
Add Quaker(R) Oats to a container of your choice and pour in milk.
Mix in vanilla extract and cinnamon.
Alternate between layers of Greek yogurt, blueberries, and banana, then drizzle on honey.
Refrigerate overnight and enjoy in the morning!
Top with additional blueberries and pecans, if desired.
